name: Super Bongo Spiders
description:
Super Bongo Spiders is a 2D platformer puzzle game that was inspired by the theme of "repair". Our take was to have swarms of spiders who roam planets fixing items in order to save their friends and family. There are 4 spiders who each have a unique ability. The game is meant to be a very difficult puzzle that you must fail many times before figuring it out! This was made in 48 hours as our entry for Global Game Jam

Created By:

- Tremaine Duquesnay-Mellis 

- Tristan Fish

 - Conor Long 

- Benjamin Sayliss
